TopicTitle: [0.25] Vinyl All-Round Products Mod Thread - Radial Probe Core - Inline Mystery Goo

Articles.Content:
Alright, so here's my mega mod thread thing. I'll post any mods I might make on this topic, along with any other updates about them I may have.

---------------Radial Probe Core----------------

Have you ever wanted to have a low profile probe core

that can be easily attached to any ship? Now you can.

Vinyl has saved the day again, and by saving the day, we mean

stuffing an OKTO core inside of a box.

Introducing, the Radial Probe Core. By Vinyl All-Round Products.

You could try putting the Radial Probe Core on a pod, so then

if the kerbal isn't in the ship, you can still control it.

The Radial Probe Core also doubles as a radial reaction wheel,

so this would be great to put on any ship to keep it balanced.

Download.

-----------------------------------------------------------------

-----------------Inline Mystery Goo------------------------------

Have you ever been annoyed by the fact that the only way to have

mystery goo on your ship is with un-aerodynamic bulky canisters?

Now that problem is solved, thanks to Vinyl All-Round Products!

Download.

---------------------------------------------------------------

----------------------Power Decouplers------------------------

Because of the need for more powerful decouplers, and the fact

that Jeb won't stop complaining about it, Vinyl All-Round Products are introducing

the Power Decouplers. These are decouplers with a lot more strength than your average decoupler

making them ideal for cannons or deorbiting something. Or just blowing something up.

Download.

This is cool! I really needed a radial probe core for one of my projects. Thanks!
